snippet.title: Wisdom Watcher: DEMO Gameplay
snippet.description:
Step into the arena of Wisdom Watcher. Experience Glory Kills, collect cards, and strategize against cunning monsters in our latest VR demo.

--
🧝 Take the role of a pilgrim from the Wisdom Watchers, summoned by magic in the astral dimension to fight against the monstrous entities who inhabit it . 

💥 Your Virtual Reality Battle starts here:
➡️ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2474850/Wisdom_Watcher/
➡️ AppLab: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/6494816893945076/

The energy of the astral dimension is in constant motion, and magic may call you back to fight at any time, so don't miss any updates on our social media:

Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/spacewhalevr/
TikTok:  https://www.tiktok.com/@spacewhalestudio
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WisdomWatcherVR

🎮 Join our Discord group and share your insights to enhance our game: https://discord.gg/Kgf6g6w3jP
